greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Irregular triangle read by rows T(n,k), (n >= 1, k >= 1), in which row n has length the partition number A000041(n-1) and every column k is A000203, the sum of divisors function.
comment: Conjecture: the sum of row n equals A138879(n), the sum of all parts in the last section of the set of partitions of n.
program: T(n, k) = {if (k > f(n), error("invalid k")); if (k==1, return (sigma(n))); my(s=0); while (k <= f(n-1), s++; n--;); sigma(1+s);}
tabf(nn) = {for (n=1, nn, for (k=1, f(n), print1(T(n,k), ", ");); print;);} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Jan 13 2021
xref: The length of the m-th block in row n is A187219(m), m >= 1.
results.author: _Omar E. Pol_, Nov 29 2020
